div.p: Flag_of_Nepal.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 630 × 770 pixels, file size: 2 KB)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.

td.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; font-weight: bold

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 13:31, 13 June 2010

td.span: (English description says it must be crimson red (#DC143C), while this was a #CE1126 red. I just updated the two references to the color in the source file.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:10, 20 April 2010

td.span: (I fixed the issue that I had (the strange border) but after looking at the redone image, the sun elements seemed to be broken.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 10:25, 20 April 2010
Thumbnail for version as of 23:43, 7 January 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 23:36, 7 January 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 21:46, 19 May 2006

td.span: (Still bad. Manually edited to remove that metadata.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 21:44, 19 May 2006

td.span: (Touched with inkscape. While well-thumbnailed, the svg was bad-formed so couldn't display. (See bugzilla:6022))

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:33, 28 September 2005

td.span: (The flag of Nepal. Source: Drawn by User:SKopp {{Template:Insignia}} Category:Flags of Nepal)
